page.title: 20 THE CONTRIBUTORS
page.content:
This account was contributed by two schools from the area: Maidstone Girls' Grammar School and St.Francis R.C.Primary School.
MAIDSTONE GIRLS' GRAMMAR SCHOOL Co-ordinater - Mrs Susan Mead Contributors - Sue Laidler,Alison Kemp, Katharine Chapman, Cathy Lambert, Jane Todd and Sara Pinnegar.
ST.FRANCIS R.C.PRIMARY SCHOOL Co-ordinater - Mr Simon Lander Contributors - Gary Shearing, Darren Attwell, David Gilhespy, John Dent, Lynne Doyle, Clare Fisher and Stuart Hosking.
In addition many Sixth form students helped with the amenity survey, co-ordinated by Caroline Bone, Marian Cleary and Vicki Taylor.
